positive_examples: This is an example of associative network.
The associative network demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed associative network in this context.
A typical case of associative network would involve these features.
The concept of associative network applies here.
A conceptual network where nodes are linked based on associative connections and spreading activation principles.
negative_examples: This is an example of neural activation network, not associative network.
This represents conceptual network in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NeuralActivationNetwork, or other types of ConceptualNetwork

definition: A network structure where concepts are linked by associative relationships.
